trans-unit.target: Error del compilador CS0155 | Documentos de Microsoft

trans-unit.source: The type caught or thrown must be derived from System.Exception
trans-unit.target: El tipo detectado o producido debe derivarse de System.Exception

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to pass a data type that does not derive from **System.Exception** into a [catch](../../csharp/language-reference/keywords/try-catch.md) block.
trans-unit.target: Se intentó pasar un tipo de datos que no se deriva de **System.Exception** en un [catch](../../csharp/language-reference/keywords/try-catch.md) bloque.

trans-unit.source: Only data types that derive from **System.Exception** can be passed into a **catch** block.
trans-unit.target: Solo los tipos de datos que se derivan de **System.Exception** se pueden pasar a un bloque **catch** .

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Exception Handling Statements](../../csharp/language-reference/keywords/exception-handling-statements.md) and [Exceptions and Exception Handling](../../csharp/programming-guide/exceptions/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [instrucciones de control de excepciones](../../csharp/language-reference/keywords/exception-handling-statements.md) y [excepciones y control de excepciones](../../csharp/programming-guide/exceptions/index.md).
